source.name: EPA's Office of General Counsel (OGC) Web Page
source.description: The Office of General Counsel issues memoranda, opinions, and determinations (including class determinations), many of which are for internal Agency use only. However, a number of OGC documents are publicly available in electronic legal research databases such as LexisNexis and Westlaw. Some are published in the Federal Register, and a number, listed on this web page, appear in printed compilations available in most EPA libraries, including the Office of General Counsel Law Library.  Other publicly-available Office of General Counsel documents are available on this web page, grouped by topic: Information Law; Pesticides and Toxic Substances; Water
